As a Office Clerks, General with Master's Degree, your work involves perform duties too varied and diverse to be classified in any specific office clerical occupation, requiring knowledge of office systems and procedures. clerical duties may be assigned in accordance with the office procedures of individual establishments and may include a combination of answering telephones, bookkeeping, typing or word processing, office machine operation, and filing.
